jmpy.bayes.oneway.oneway(x, y, data=None, control=None, iterations=24000, burn=4000, verbose=False)[source]¶

Generate a oneway anova via bayesian markov-chain monte carlo

Parameters:
  • x – str or ndarray, x axis (grouping axis)
  • y – str or ndarray, y axis (values)
  • data – pandas dataframe or Null
  • control – If x has greater than two groups, you need to compare vs. the control
  • iterations –
  • burn –
  • verbose – bool; default=False; turns on pymc progress bar
Returns:

a results object.
